title: The Signal Fire
correct_answer: SIGNAL

title: The Rising Tide
correct_answer: LIVE

title: The Fabric Rope
correct_answer: DESCEND

title: The Unlocked Door
correct_answer: PUSH THE DOOR OPEN AND WALK OUT

title: The Sawdust Bridge
correct_answer: PACK SAWDUST INTO PLASTIC SHEETING TUBES TO CREATE RIGID COMPRESSION BEAMS, THEN SPAN THE GAP WITH PALLETS

title: The Paper Prison
correct_answer: PUSH THE DOOR OPEN -- IT IS CLOSED BUT NOT LOCKED

title: The Sweet Poison
correct_answer: EAT NEITHER THE RED NOR THE GREEN BERRIES -- HARVEST THE CATTAILS GROWING IN THE NEARBY MARSH

title: The Last Train
correct_answer: PARTIALLY ENGAGE THE JUNCTION SWITCH TO DERAIL THE RAILCAR INTO THE SOFT EMBANKMENT

title: The Whistle Code
correct_answer: USE MORSE CODE TRANSMITTED VIA WHISTLE PITCHES (HIGH = DOT, LOW = DASH) TO COMMUNICATE THROUGH THE WALL

title: The Salt Battery
correct_answer: BUILD A VOLTAIC PILE (COPPER/SALTWATER/ZINC CELLS IN SERIES) TO POWER THE EMERGENCY RADIO

title: The Checkout Paradox
correct_answer: WALK OUT THROUGH THE LOADING DOCK

title: The Furnace Room
correct_answer: REMOVE THE HINGE PINS

title: The Newspaper Shelter
correct_answer: BUILD INSULATED SHELTER USING NEWSPAPER INSIDE GARBAGE BAGS

title: The Sinking Fix
correct_answer: BAIL WATER FIRST, THEN SCULL TO SHORE WITH ONE OAR, THEN FIX THE LEAK ON LAND

title: The Capillary Climb
correct_answer: RIDE THE CAPILLARY MENISCUS UPWARD -- AT 1MM SCALE, SURFACE TENSION DOMINATES AND WATER CLIMBS THE TUBE AUTOMATICALLY

title: The Water Wheel
correct_answer: THE WHEEL IS AN OVERSHOT WATER WHEEL DRIVEN BY GRAVITY VIA A FLUME, NOT BY THE STREAM CURRENT

title: The Emergency Exit
correct_answer: USE THE FIRE EXIT AT THE END OF CORRIDOR B

title: The Broken Clock
correct_answer: USE THE STOPPED CLOCK TIME (3:47) AS AN INDEX -- BOOK 3, CHAPTER 4, PAGE 7 CONTAINS A KEY TAPED INSIDE

title: The Smoke Signal
correct_answer: BUILD A DRY WOOD FIRE, ADD GREEN LEAVES FOR WHITE SMOKE, USE DAMP TARP TO CREATE THREE DISTINCT PUFFS

title: The Mud Mortar
correct_answer: USE WATTLE-AND-DAUB TECHNIQUE -- PACK CLAY-RICH MUD MIXED WITH GRASS FIBERS BETWEEN LAYERS TO BUILD A COMPACTED BERM

title: The Fog Signal
correct_answer: USE STANDARD MARITIME HORN SIGNALS (COLREGS) TO COMMUNICATE INTENTIONS AND AVOID COLLISION

title: The Smoke Detector
correct_answer: TRIGGER A SMOKE DETECTOR TO ACTIVATE THE FIRE ALARM, WHICH AUTO-UNLOCKS ALL FIRE DOORS

title: The Citrus Degreaser
correct_answer: USE LEMON PEEL (D-LIMONENE) AS A NATURAL DEGREASER, THEN BAKING SODA PASTE FOR ABRASION; VINEGAR IS A DISTRACTOR

title: The Rattling Pipe
correct_answer: WATER HAMMER

title: The River Crossing
correct_answer: USE PHYSICAL DEMONSTRATION AND IMITATION TO COORDINATE ROWING

title: The Cattail Torch
correct_answer: SOAK CATTAIL SEED HEADS IN RENDERED FAT AND USE AS A TORCH

title: The Birch Bark Fire
correct_answer: STRIKE THE STEEL KNIFE AGAINST THE FLINT TO PRODUCE SPARKS. USE THE SPARKS TO IGNITE THE BIRCH BARK, WHICH CONTAINS HIGHLY FLAMMABLE BIRCH OIL.

title: The Revolving Door
correct_answer: PUSH THE REVOLVING DOOR MANUALLY OR FOLD THE BREAKAWAY PANELS FLAT FOR EMERGENCY EGRESS

title: The Egg Carton Armor
correct_answer: USE EGG CARTONS AS IMPACT-ABSORBING PACKAGING, CRUMPLED NEWSPAPER AS GAP-FILLING CUSHION, AND STRING TO SECURE THE BUNDLES.

title: The Cork Float
correct_answer: USE THE MAGNET ON A STRING TO RETRIEVE THE KEYS

title: The Light Signal
correct_answer: FLASH IN PATTERNS TO COMMUNICATE

title: The Boat Shed
correct_answer: EXIT THROUGH THE FLOOR INTO THE WATER BELOW

title: The Mushroom Compass
correct_answer: USE MOSS AND MUSHROOM GROWTH PATTERNS ON MULTIPLE TREES TO DETERMINE NORTH (NORTHERN HEMISPHERE), THEN NAVIGATE BY DIRECTION

title: The Plantain Bandage
correct_answer: CRUSH A PLANTAIN LEAF (PLANTAGO MAJOR) AND APPLY DIRECTLY TO THE WOUND AS A POULTICE

title: The Skylight Escape
correct_answer: DRIVE THE FORKLIFT UNDER THE SKYLIGHT, RAISE THE FORKS TO MAXIMUM HEIGHT, CLIMB THE FORKS, AND EXIT THROUGH THE SKYLIGHT

title: The Soap Boat
correct_answer: USE THE MARANGONI EFFECT -- SOAP REDUCES SURFACE TENSION BEHIND YOU, PULLING YOU FORWARD

title: The Battery Recall
correct_answer: DRIVE DOWN THE MOUNTAIN -- REGENERATIVE BRAKING WILL RECHARGE THE BATTERY

title: The Tallow Candle
correct_answer: RENDER THE ANIMAL FAT INTO TALLOW AND MAKE A CANDLE WITH A COTTON WICK IN A TIN CAN

title: The Urine Compass
correct_answer: USE STICK SHADOW METHOD TO DETERMINE EAST-WEST LINE

title: The Gym Membership
correct_answer: WALK OUT THROUGH THE GYM'S GROUND-FLOOR EXIT

title: The Drain Escape
correct_answer: REMOVE THE FLOOR DRAIN GRATE AND EXIT THROUGH THE SEWER PIPE

title: The Mud Brick
correct_answer: MAKE ADOBE BRICKS FROM CLAY SOIL, STRAW, AND WATER

title: The Willow Bark Tea
correct_answer: BREW TEA FROM WILLOW BARK -- IT CONTAINS SALICIN, THE NATURAL PRECURSOR TO ASPIRIN, WHICH PROVIDES EFFECTIVE PAIN RELIEF

title: The Lantern Signal
correct_answer: SIGNAL THE RESCUE BOAT USING THE LANTERN IN A RECOGNIZABLE PATTERN

title: The Greenhouse Vent
correct_answer: CRANK OPEN A ROOF VENT AND CLIMB OUT THROUGH THE ROOF

title: The Broken Thermometer
correct_answer: THE PATIENT HAS A FEVER -- 98.6F IS ABOVE THEIR INDIVIDUAL BASELINE OF 97.0F

title: The Pine Needle Tea
correct_answer: BREW TEA FROM FRESH PINE NEEDLES TO TREAT VITAMIN C DEFICIENCY

title: The Fire Code Door
correct_answer: USE THE FIRE EXIT DOORS -- THEY ARE ALWAYS UNLOCKED FROM THE INSIDE BY LAW

title: The Cob Wall
correct_answer: BUILD A COB WALL FROM CLAY SOIL, SAND, STRAW, AND WATER

title: The Ant Raft
correct_answer: FORM A LIVING RAFT BY LINKING BODIES TOGETHER -- TRAPPED AIR BETWEEN BODIES PROVIDES BUOYANCY, HYDROPHOBIC OUTER LAYER REPELS WATER

title: The Loading Dock
correct_answer: WALK OUT THROUGH DOCK C -- THE OVERHEAD DOOR IS OPEN FOR A SCHEDULED DELIVERY

title: The Basement Window
correct_answer: EXIT THROUGH THE EGRESS WINDOW

title: The Overflow Cascade
correct_answer: TURN OFF THE MAIN WATER SHUTOFF VALVE

title: The River Stone
correct_answer: SEND A WATERPROOF MESSAGE DOWNSTREAM VIA THE RIVER CURRENT

title: The Radiometer Puzzle
correct_answer: THE CROOKES RADIOMETER SPINS DUE TO THERMAL TRANSPIRATION AT VANE EDGES, NOT PHOTON PRESSURE

title: The Wattle Fence
correct_answer: BUILD A WATTLE FENCE BY WEAVING FLEXIBLE BRANCHES BETWEEN DRIVEN UPRIGHTS

title: The Water Heater
correct_answer: THAW THE FROZEN PIPE FIRST -- IT IS UPSTREAM OF THE WATER HEATER AND BLOCKING ALL WATER FLOW

title: The Water Tower
correct_answer: PARTIALLY DRAIN THE TOWER TO BELOW THE LEAK LEVEL -- MAINTAIN WATER SERVICE WHILE ENABLING INTERIOR REPAIR

title: The Dock Leaf
correct_answer: CRUSH A DOCK LEAF AND RUB THE SAP ON THE NETTLE STING

title: The Laundry Chute
correct_answer: ESCAPE VIA LAUNDRY CHUTE

title: The Vinegar Battery
correct_answer: FIX CORRODED CONTACTS FIRST, THEN TEST BATTERIES, THEN IMPROVISE IF NEEDED

title: The Plantago Poultice
correct_answer: APPLY A CRUSHED PLANTAGO MAJOR (BROADLEAF PLANTAIN) LEAF POULTICE TO THE STING

title: The Blast Room
correct_answer: LIVE

title: The Cold Lock
correct_answer: LIVE

title: The Smoke Signal
correct_answer: LIVE

title: The Paper Bridge
correct_answer: CROSS

title: The Gas Mask Trap
correct_answer: GET LOW AND BREATHE NEAR THE FLOOR

title: The Tunnel Split
correct_answer: BOTH SURVIVORS EXIT THE TUNNEL

title: The Drone Decision
correct_answer: SAVE BOTH CARGO AND LIVES (Option C)

title: The Giant's Staircase
correct_answer: TRAVERSE

title: The Spinning Wheel
correct_answer: EXPLAIN

title: The Missing Catalyst
correct_answer: NEUTRALIZE

title: The Broken Compass
correct_answer: NAVIGATE

title: The Fire Exit Paradox
correct_answer: ESCAPE

title: The Drowning Archive
correct_answer: USE THE CO2 FIRE EXTINGUISHER TO FREEZE WATER AROUND THE DOOR SEAL, THEN OPEN THE DOOR

title: The Sleeping Compass
correct_answer: REMOVE THE HIDDEN MAGNET FROM THE COMPASS HOUSING -- THE COMPASS ITSELF IS FUNCTIONAL

title: The Pipe Organ
correct_answer: REPAIR SEQUENCE: DAMPER FIRST, THEN COOLANT, THEN INTAKE (OR: COOLANT FIRST WITH PARTIAL DAMPER, THEN FULL DAMPER, THEN INTAKE)

title: The Chalk Line
correct_answer: USE WALL STUDS AS SHARED REFERENCE POINTS TO ESTABLISH A BINARY TAP CODE FOR WIRE IDENTIFICATION AND CUTTING INSTRUCTIONS

title: The Coin Flip
correct_answer: REMOVE THE BACKUP BATTERY TO DISABLE THE AUTOMATED SYSTEM, THEN DISARM IT COMPLETELY -- SAVING BOTH ROOMS

title: The Clockwork Heart
correct_answer: THE CLOCK IS AN ATMOS-TYPE MECHANISM POWERED BY ATMOSPHERIC TEMPERATURE FLUCTUATIONS ACTING ON BIMETALLIC STRIPS IN THE CASE

title: The Missing Catalyst
correct_answer: USE SODIS (SOLAR WATER DISINFECTION) -- FILL CLEAR BOTTLES, PLACE ON REFLECTIVE EMERGENCY BLANKET WITH BLACK FABRIC UNDERNEATH, EXPOSE TO SUNLIGHT FOR 2-4 HOURS

title: The Rosetta Stone
correct_answer: THE CODE IS DERIVED FROM THE NUMBER OF SYLLABLES IN EACH COLOR NAME AT PRIME-NUMBERED POSITIONS: THE CODE IS 2213

title: The Rubber Hammer
correct_answer: FILL THE GLASS JAR WITH WATER, SEAL IT, AND USE IT AS AN INCOMPRESSIBLE HAMMER TO DRIVE THE NAIL

title: The Signal Tower
correct_answer: USE THE SUN'S POSITION AS A SHARED REFERENCE CLOCK TO ESTABLISH DIRECTIONAL SIGNALING

title: The Flea Circus
correct_answer: ROLL THE CRYSTAL USING A PAPERCLIP WIRE RAMP AND EXPLOIT FAVORABLE SCALING OF DRAG FORCES

title: The Maze of Mirrors
correct_answer: FEEL FOR INVISIBLE GLASS DOOR HANDLES -- THE WALLS ARE HINGED GLASS DOORS WITH TRANSPARENT HANDLES

title: The Honey Trap
correct_answer: USE THE BEESWAX BLOCK (NOT THE HONEY) TO SEAL THE CRACKED PIPE

title: The Singing Wire
correct_answer: MAGNETOSTRICTION CAUSED BY ALTERNATING MAGNETIC FIELD FROM NEARBY POWER LINES

title: The Ash Concrete
correct_answer: MIX WOOD ASH WITH SAND AND WATER TO CREATE A POZZOLANIC CEMENT BARRIER

title: The Submarine Garden
correct_answer: USE THE CHAIN WRAPPED AROUND THE WHEEL AS A FORCE MULTIPLIER, WITH THE RUBBER BOOT FOR GRIP, TO TURN THE ESCAPE HATCH

title: The Avalanche Valve
correct_answer: USE BODY HEAT AND BLANKET INSULATION TO THAW A SMALL PIPE SECTION, GET WATER FOR ICE WINDOW SEAL, THEN LET THE WARMER ROOM THAW MORE PIPES NATURALLY

title: The Spider's Crane
correct_answer: USE SILK THREADS AS A PULLEY SYSTEM ANCHORED TO GRASS BLADES TO LIFT AND MOVE THE INSECT CARCASS

title: The Mercury Switch
correct_answer: THIS TASK IS PHYSICALLY IMPOSSIBLE. PROVE IMPOSSIBILITY AND IDENTIFY THE BINDING CONSTRAINT.

title: The Trolley Bypass
correct_answer: CLOSE BOTH VALVES TO DIVERT CHEMICAL INTO THE UPSTREAM CONTAINMENT BASIN

title: The Magnetic Spinner
correct_answer: IMPOSSIBLE -- the claimed perpetual acceleration violates conservation of energy. A hidden energy source (electromagnet) must exist.

title: The Vinegar Engine
correct_answer: USE VINEGAR TO DISSOLVE COPPER OXIDE CORROSION FROM ELECTRICAL CONTACTS

title: The Firewall Walk
correct_answer: USE THE MANUAL FIRE EXIT OVERRIDE HANDLES REQUIRED BY BUILDING CODE

title: The Elevator Shaft
correct_answer: USE THE UMBRELLA TO OPEN THE CEILING HATCH, CLIMB OUT TO THE SHAFT, AND ACCESS THE SHAFT-SIDE DOOR

title: The Dental Dam
correct_answer: CUT AND STRETCH THE BICYCLE INNER TUBE OVER THE CRACK, LETTING WATER PRESSURE CREATE THE SEAL

title: The Morse Mirror
correct_answer: FLASH SOS IN MORSE CODE -- THE PATTERN ITSELF SIGNALS INTELLIGENCE EVEN TO RECEIVERS WHO DO NOT KNOW MORSE

title: The Decoy Door
correct_answer: USE THE UNMARKED DOOR -- THE EXIT SIGN IS A TRAP, THE ENVIRONMENTAL CUES (ARCING, EXPOSED WIRES) INDICATE THE MARKED DOOR IS ELECTRIFIED

title: The Thermostat War
correct_answer: CREATE A THERMAL GRADIENT VIA PARTIAL ONE-SIDED VENTING

title: The Matchless Furnace
correct_answer: USE EXOTHERMIC REACTION OF CALCIUM OXIDE (QUICKLIME) AND WATER TO GENERATE HEAT

title: The Cardboard Bridge
correct_answer: CONSTRUCT TRIANGULAR TUBE BEAMS FROM CORRUGATED CARDBOARD, WATERPROOF WITH PLASTIC BAGS, AND SPAN THE STREAM

title: The Frozen Lock
correct_answer: USE COOKING OIL TO DISPLACE ICE FROM THE LOCK MECHANISM, THEN IGNITE STEEL WOOL WITH MATCHES TO WARM THE HANDLE

title: The Tin Can Radio
correct_answer: BUILD A FIELD TELEPHONE USING MAGNETS AND COPPER COIL, NOT A TIN-CAN-AND-STRING PHONE

title: The Quicksand Myth
correct_answer: LEAN BACK TO INCREASE SURFACE AREA, WIGGLE LEGS SLOWLY TO INTRODUCE WATER, THEN BACKSTROKE TO SOLID GROUND

title: The Lighthouse Code
correct_answer: FLASH SOS WITH THE SEARCHLIGHT -- THE KEEPER WILL RECOGNIZE THE UNIVERSAL DISTRESS PATTERN AND CALL THE COAST GUARD

title: The Raindrop Mountain
correct_answer: VIBRATE THE LEAF BY RHYTHMICALLY STRIKING IT TO INDUCE RESONANCE, CAUSING THE RAINDROP TO ROLL AWAY

title: The Crystal Radio
correct_answer: THE RADIO WORKS WITHOUT EXTERNAL POWER BECAUSE IT IS A CRYSTAL RADIO -- IT HARVESTS ENERGY DIRECTLY FROM THE INCOMING RADIO WAVES

title: The Locked PDF
correct_answer: THE SAFETY INFORMATION IS LEGALLY REQUIRED TO BE PHYSICALLY POSTED IN THE FACILITY -- LOOK FOR THE MANDATORY PHYSICAL POSTINGS

title: The Tide Table
correct_answer: READ THE WALL MARKINGS AS A TIDE GAUGE -- HORIZONTAL LINES = LOW TIDE, CROSSES = MID-TIDE, CIRCLES = HIGH TIDE (DANGER). THE CURRENT WATER LEVEL RELATIVE TO THE MARKS TELLS YOU THE TIDAL PHASE AND WHEN TO EXIT.

title: The Rust Nail
correct_answer: CREATE IRON ACETATE SOLUTION FROM NAILS + VINEGAR + SALT, APPLY TO ROCK FOR PERMANENT IRON OXIDE STAIN

title: The Aquifer Pump
correct_answer: SEAL THE CRACKED RISER PIPE WITH BENTONITE CLAY, THEN PRIME THE PUMP

title: The Chimney Problem
correct_answer: BUILD A SMOKY FIRE IN THE FIREPLACE TO SIGNAL THROUGH THE CHIMNEY

title: The Engine Block
correct_answer: POUR HOT WATER OVER THE STARTER TO THIN CORROSION, THEN PUSH-START THE VEHICLE

title: The Leaning Tower
correct_answer: THE SHELF IS BOLTED TO THE WALL WITH HIDDEN L-BRACKETS BEHIND THE BOOKS, PROVIDING A REACTION FORCE THAT PREVENTS TOPPLING

title: The Mud Battery
correct_answer: BUILD A MICROBIAL FUEL CELL USING ALUMINUM AND COPPER ELECTRODES IN MUD

title: The Pollen Ferry
correct_answer: MAKE MULTIPLE TRIPS (CARRY HALF EACH TIME) OR WALK ALONG STEMS AND LEAVES INSTEAD OF FLYING

title: The Ground Wave
correct_answer: COMMUNICATE BY STRIKING THE ROCKY GROUND WITH HAMMERS -- SEISMIC WAVES TRAVEL THROUGH ROCK AND CAN BE FELT BY THE OTHER PERSON

title: The Oil Drop Lens
correct_answer: USE A WATER DROPLET AS A SPHERICAL LENS TO MAGNIFY FINE DETAIL

title: The Paradox of Choice
correct_answer: IMPOSSIBLE -- THREE LEVERS REQUIRING 12 SECONDS EACH CANNOT ALL BE PULLED WITHIN 30 SECONDS BY ONE PERSON WITH TWO HANDS

title: The Self-Winding Watch
correct_answer: THE WATCH IS AN AUTOMATIC (SELF-WINDING) MECHANICAL WATCH -- AN OSCILLATING ROTOR CONVERTS THE WEARER'S BODY MOVEMENTS INTO MAINSPRING TENSION

title: The Screw Holes
correct_answer: THE PATTERN OF FILLED AND EMPTY HOLES ENCODES A BINARY NUMBER -- BINARY 101100110010 = DECIMAL 2866, WHICH IS THE KEY CODE

title: The Ice Box
correct_answer: USE THE INTERNAL EMERGENCY RELEASE HANDLE -- ALL MODERN REFRIGERATED SHIPPING CONTAINERS HAVE ONE PER ISO SAFETY STANDARDS

title: The Vine Rope
correct_answer: BRAID THREE VINES TOGETHER TO CREATE A ROPE WITH APPROXIMATELY 2.5X THE STRENGTH OF A SINGLE VINE

title: The Temperature Tell
correct_answer: USE THE THERMOMETER TO MEASURE ROOM TEMPERATURES -- THE WARMEST ROOM WAS RECENTLY OCCUPIED

title: The Compost Heater
correct_answer: BUILD COMPOST HEATING SYSTEM

title: The Flag Semaphore
correct_answer: USE FLAG SEMAPHORE COMMUNICATION

title: The Honey Antibiotic
correct_answer: APPLY HONEY AS WOUND DRESSING

title: The Grandfather Clause
correct_answer: INVOKE THE GRANDFATHER CLAUSE

title: The Bookshelf Cipher
correct_answer: THE HIDDEN ITEM IS ON THE ROOF

title: The Container Escape
correct_answer: ESCAPE THROUGH THE PLYWOOD FLOOR

title: The Shoe Polish Seal
correct_answer: MELT SHOE POLISH WAX TO SEAL THE CRACK

title: The Clock Auction
correct_answer: NEGOTIATE WITH THE OTHER BIDDER TO SPLIT THE COST AND SHARE THE SUPPLY

title: The Crookes Radiometer
correct_answer: THE VANES SPIN DUE TO THERMAL TRANSPIRATION (GAS DYNAMICS AT VANE EDGES), NOT PHOTON PRESSURE

title: The ADA Override
correct_answer: FIND THE BUILDING'S SECONDARY ACCESSIBLE ENTRANCE (REQUIRED BY ADA)

title: The Vine Clock
correct_answer: READ THE YEAR FROM THE IVY PATTERN AND CALCULATE THE BURIAL DEPTH

title: The Sand Cement
correct_answer: CREATE A SUGAR-GLASS-AND-SAND COMPOSITE TO FORM TRAIL MARKERS

title: The Shadow Message
correct_answer: AT NOON THE TOWER HAS NO SHADOW -- LOOK DIRECTLY AT THE BASE OF THE TOWER

title: The Star Navigation
correct_answer: BOTH GROUPS WALK TOWARD POLARIS (THE NORTH STAR). WALKING TOWARD THE SAME FIXED POINT GUARANTEES CONVERGENCE.

title: The Surface Skater
correct_answer: WALK ON WATER USING SURFACE TENSION. AT 1CM BODY SIZE AND 0.1G MASS, SURFACE TENSION FORCE EXCEEDS GRAVITY BY A FACTOR OF 6X.

title: The Well Escape
correct_answer: CHIMNEY-CLIMB OUT OF THE WELL. THE 1-METER DIAMETER IS IDEAL FOR CHIMNEY CLIMBING TECHNIQUE.

title: The Compass Rose
correct_answer: OPEN THE SOUTH-FACING DOOR

title: The Gas Gradient
correct_answer: EVACUATE THE BASEMENT -- THE LEAK SOURCE IS THERE

title: The Bridge of Boats
correct_answer: SEQUENCE: ANCHOR B FIRST, THEN POSITION A ALONGSIDE, THEN USE C AS A SHUTTLE

title: The Paramecium's Hunt
correct_answer: CHEMOTAXIS VIA BIASED RANDOM WALK (RUN-AND-TUMBLE)

title: The Dandelion Insulation
correct_answer: STUFF GARBAGE BAGS WITH DANDELION FLUFF TO CREATE IMPROVISED INSULATION PANELS

title: The Toll Bridge
correct_answer: IMPOSSIBLE TO CROSS ALONE WITHOUT EXTERNAL HELP. THE CORRECT ACTION IS TO SEEK ASSISTANCE.

title: The Grass Rope
correct_answer: TWIST GRASS INTO TWO-PLY REVERSE-TWIST CORDAGE

title: The UV Warning
correct_answer: THE UV FLUORESCENCE EXTENDS FAR BEYOND THE ACTUAL SPILL. USE VISIBLE-LIGHT INSPECTION, NOT UV, TO DETERMINE THE TRUE SPILL BOUNDARY.

title: The Irrigation Cascade
correct_answer: CLEAR BLOCKAGE FIRST, THEN PUMP STABILIZES, THEN FIX TIMER

title: The Spore Cannon
correct_answer: USE OSMOTIC PRESSURE (TURGOR PRESSURE RUPTURE) TO LAUNCH THE SPORE

title: The Diplomat's Dilemma
correct_answer: PROPOSE JOINT ADMINISTRATION (REJECT THE FALSE DICHOTOMY)

title: The Lobby Paradox
correct_answer: HAVE THE PERSON YOU ARE MEETING COME TO THE LOBBY

title: The Sand Timer
correct_answer: START THE 3-MINUTE AND 7-MINUTE HOURGLASSES SIMULTANEOUSLY; START THE 5-MINUTE WHEN THE 3 FINISHES; DOOR OPENS WHEN 7-MINUTE AND 5-MINUTE BOTH FINISH (SUMS TO 3+7=10... SEE BELOW)

title: The Sap Glue
correct_answer: MAKE PINE PITCH ADHESIVE FROM RESIN AND CHARCOAL

title: The Trail Bias
correct_answer: TAKE THE FAINT LEFT PATH (THE HUMAN TRAIL), NOT THE WELL-WORN RIGHT PATH (THE GAME TRAIL)

title: The Smoke Relay
correct_answer: RELAY SMOKE SIGNALS THROUGH INTERMEDIATE CAMPS

title: The Weather Signal
correct_answer: FLY INTERNATIONAL STORM WARNING FLAGS AND SOUND HORN BLASTS TO WARN THE VILLAGE

title: The Solar Still
correct_answer: THE CONTAINER IS A SOLAR STILL -- SUNLIGHT EVAPORATES MOISTURE FROM THE SOIL INSIDE, WHICH CONDENSES ON THE GLASS AND DRIPS INTO A COLLECTION AREA. THE WATER WAS ALWAYS IN THE SOIL.

title: The Footprint Code
correct_answer: READ THE PHYSICAL EVIDENCE IN THE FOOTPRINTS -- DEPTH REVEALS WEIGHT, SPACING REVEALS SPEED, TOE-DIG REVEALS GAIT, SCUFF MARKS REVEAL STRUGGLE. RECONSTRUCT THE SEQUENCE OF EVENTS FROM THE PHYSICS OF IMPRESSION FORMATION.

title: The Tunnel Vision
correct_answer: WALK ON THE EMERGENCY WALKWAY (NARROW CONCRETE LEDGE ON THE EAST WALL) ON THE OPPOSITE SIDE FROM THE ELECTRIFIED THIRD RAIL

title: The Runaway Bus
correct_answer: SHIFT TO LOWEST GEAR FOR ENGINE BRAKING AND ENGAGE THE PARKING BRAKE -- TWO INDEPENDENT BRAKING SYSTEMS EXIST BEYOND THE FAILED HYDRAULIC BRAKES

title: The Printer Paradox
correct_answer: FILL OUT THE PAPER FORM ON THE DESK AND DROP IT IN THE SUBMISSION BOX IN THE HALLWAY

title: The Leather Belt Bridge
correct_answer: BUCKLE THE FIVE BELTS END-TO-END TO CREATE A 5.5M TENSION MEMBER, LOOP IT AROUND AN ANCHOR, AND TYROLEAN TRAVERSE ACROSS THE 3M CREVICE

title: The Refraction Rescue
correct_answer: AIM BELOW WHERE YOU SEE THE FISH -- LIGHT REFRACTION MAKES SUBMERGED OBJECTS APPEAR SHALLOWER AND SHIFTED TOWARD THE SURFACE

title: The Cistern Trap
correct_answer: ESCAPE BY FLOATING TO THE GRATE ON SEALED BARRELS

title: The Bone Needle
correct_answer: MAKE A NEEDLE FROM A FISH BONE AND USE SINEW AS THREAD

title: The Thermal Stack
correct_answer: OPEN WINDOWS ON THE GROUND FLOOR TO RELEASE EXCESS HEAT AT THE SOURCE

title: The Clay Pot Cooler
correct_answer: BUILD A ZEER POT (POT-IN-POT COOLER) USING EVAPORATIVE COOLING

title: The Pipe Chase
correct_answer: REMOVE THE PIPE CHASE ACCESS PANEL AND CLIMB THROUGH THE VERTICAL SHAFT TO THE NEXT FLOOR

title: The Sand Drawing
correct_answer: DRAW PICTOGRAPHIC MESSAGES IN THE SAND

title: The Moss Code
correct_answer: THE TREE WITH SOUTH-SIDE MOSS IS THE MARKER -- THE ROCK CREATING SHADE ANOMALY IS A HUMAN PLACEMENT, AND A CAIRN AT ITS BASE CONTAINS THE CACHE

title: The Nutrient Cascade
correct_answer: LOWER pH FIRST -- THIS SIMULTANEOUSLY FIXES CALCIUM AVAILABILITY AND REDUCES MAGNESIUM EXCESS

title: The Ice Lens
correct_answer: CARVE A CONVEX LENS FROM CLEAR ICE AND USE IT TO FOCUS SUNLIGHT ONTO TINDER TO START A FIRE

title: The Inheritance Lock
correct_answer: IDENTIFY THE MATHEMATICAL PATTERN IN THE FIRST 4 DIGITS AND EXTRAPOLATE THE REMAINING 2 DIGITS

title: The Bernoulli Lifter
correct_answer: BERNOULLI'S PRINCIPLE -- THE FAST-MOVING AIR BETWEEN THE DISCS HAS LOWER PRESSURE THAN THE SURROUNDING STILL AIR, CREATING A NET INWARD FORCE THAT PULLS THE DISCS TOGETHER

title: The Neighbor's Key
correct_answer: USE THE 2CM-OPEN BATHROOM WINDOW OR RETRIEVE THE SPARE KEY FROM THE PLANT-WATERING NEIGHBOR

title: The Sphagnum Wound
correct_answer: APPLY SPHAGNUM MOSS AS A WOUND DRESSING

title: The Wax Tablet
correct_answer: REMOVE THE REMAINING WAX TO REVEAL TEXT IMPRESSED IN THE WOODEN BACKING

title: The Afterimage
correct_answer: THE CAR WAS WHITE -- THE WITNESS SAW A RED AFTERIMAGE FROM STARING AT THE GREEN TRAFFIC LIGHT

title: The Tidal Cascade
correct_answer: CLEAR THE OUTFLOW CHANNEL FIRST

title: The Cattail Rope
correct_answer: MAKE CORDAGE FROM CATTAIL LEAVES USING THE REVERSE-TWIST TECHNIQUE

title: The Mooring Cascade
correct_answer: ADJUST THE SPRING LINE FIRST TO CONTROL SURGE, THEN RE-TENSION BOW AND STERN LINES

title: The Color Code
correct_answer: USE THE VISIBLE LIGHT SPECTRUM AS A UNIVERSAL ORDINAL REFERENCE TO MAP COLORS TO DIGITS

title: The Termite Mound
correct_answer: BUILD A TERMITE-MOUND-INSPIRED STRUCTURE WITH THICK THERMAL-MASS WALLS, ORIENTED CHIMNEY, AND POROUS VENTILATION

title: The Heliograph
correct_answer: USE HELIOGRAPH SIGNALING -- AIM MIRROR TO FLASH SUNLIGHT AT THE OTHER PEAK AND USE HAND-SHUTTER FOR MORSE CODE

title: The Jury Rig
